price: Cyagendaga (hejuru y’amazi) tugihanze amaso; (ibyo) biba igihembo cy’uwo bahakanye.
arabic: تَجۡرِي بِأَعۡيُنِنَا جَزَآءٗ لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: tajrī bi-aʿyuninā jazāan liman kāna kufira
